name: Monisha
greetingText: I really miss you so much
wishText: Monisha, Every second, youâ€™re with me in my imagination. My love for you is unwavering, and I dream of the day I can hold you close again. Until then, know that you are always in my heart.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Let me know if you feel my hug through this message.
